projects.name: Flowers

steps.instruction: Wrap two 36cm (14 1/4in) strips of 20-gauge wire in 1.5cm (5/8in) wide crepe paper, overlapping the ends of the wire by 7.5cm (3in).
steps.visual_description: Two green wires being wrapped with a strip of green crepe paper, showing the overlap at the ends.

steps.instruction: Use crepe paper to secure the join.
steps.visual_description: Close-up of hands securing the join of the wrapped wire with a strip of crepe paper.

steps.instruction: Spray mount two shades of green crepe paper together. Cut out 25 leaves and pinch to shape.
steps.visual_description: A hand holding a green crepe paper leaf, showing its pinched shape.

steps.instruction: Make five stems with five leaves on each. Wrap a 6cm (2 1/2in) length of 20-gauge wire with a 1.5cm (5/8in) wide strip of crepe paper, tucking and gluing in the leaves between wraps.
steps.visual_description: Hands wrapping a short piece of wire with crepe paper, and tucking in green leaves between the wraps to create a stem with leaves.

tips: Measure your head with the wire, holding the point at which the two ends need to overlap. Glue in place.
projects.finished_product_description: A flower or floral arrangement made from crepe paper leaves and wire stems.

diagram_descriptions: Diagram 1: Two green wires being wrapped with a strip of green crepe paper, showing the overlap at the ends.
Diagram 2: Close-up of hands securing the join of the wrapped wire with a strip of crepe paper.
Diagram 3: A hand holding a green crepe paper leaf, showing its pinched shape.
Diagram 4: Hands wrapping a short piece of wire with crepe paper, and tucking in green leaves between the wraps to create a stem with leaves.

projects.name: Festival Headband

steps.instruction: Attach the leaf stems to the ring using 26-gauge wire. Keep the ends of the wire away from the inside of the ring. Trim the stems if necessary.
steps.visual_description: Close-up of hands attaching green paper leaf stems to a wire ring using thin green wire. The wire ends are being tucked away.

steps.instruction: Space the leaves out evenly, facing towards a focal point at the front of the ring. Leave a large gap at the back.
steps.visual_description: A wire ring adorned with green paper leaves, spaced evenly around the front half, with a noticeable gap at the back.

steps.instruction: Attach the flowers using 26-gauge wire. Place a large peony at the focal point and space the other flowers around the headband.
steps.visual_description: Close-up of hands attaching a large peach-colored paper peony and other green paper leaves to the wire ring using green wire. The peony is positioned at the front focal point.

steps.instruction: Wrap the ring of wire in strips of green crepe paper. This will cover up any bits of wire and strengthen the ring.
steps.visual_description: Close-up of hands wrapping a strip of green crepe paper around the wire base of the headband, covering the wire and stems to secure and strengthen it.

projects.finished_product_description: A handmade headband decorated with paper leaves and a large paper peony, resembling a floral crown.

projects.name: Basic rosette

steps.instruction: Draw and score a grid on a 20x8cm (8x3in) piece of paper. Each section of the grid should be 1x4cm (1/2 x1 1/2in).
steps.visual_description: A hand using a ruler and a scoring tool to draw and score a grid on a rectangular piece of paper. The grid lines are visible.

steps.instruction: Cut the paper in half lengthwise, then fold each scored line like an accordion.
steps.visual_description: A hand folding a piece of paper along scored lines to create an accordion fold. The paper is already cut in half lengthwise.

steps.instruction: Attach the ends of the two lengths of folded paper with double-sided tape to form a circle.
steps.visual_description: A partially formed rosette made of folded paper. Hands are shown attaching the two ends of the folded paper together with double-sided tape to create a circular shape.

projects.finished_product_description: A circular rosette made from folded paper.

projects.name: Pram

steps.instruction: Cut out a 3/4 circle from card and attach an accordion fold to the upper quarter with double-sided tape.
steps.visual_description: A hand holding a light blue card cut into a 3/4 circle shape. An accordion-folded piece of white paper is being attached to the upper quarter of the card with double-sided tape.

steps.instruction: Create wheels by sticking buttons to card. Frill a piece of paper with an edge punch and glue across the middle of the circle as shown.
steps.visual_description: A hand using a glue stick to attach a white button to the light blue card. Another hand is shown with a piece of white paper that has been frilled using an edge punch, and it is being glued across the middle of the card.

steps.instruction: Tie a short piece of ribbon into a bow and stick it on for an extra flourish.
steps.visual_description: A close-up of the pram embellishment. A short piece of striped blue and white ribbon has been tied into a bow and is being stuck onto the center of the accordion fold.

projects.finished_product_description: A pram embellishment made from a 3/4 circle card with an accordion fold, buttons, and a ribbon bow.

The second template is a curved shape with several leaf-like elements attached to the bottom, with the text 'Lilac' below it. The third template is a curved arrangement of leaf-like elements in the top right corner, with the text 'Yellow' below it. The fourth template is a curved shape with several leaf-like elements attached to the bottom, with the text 'Pink' below it. The fifth template is a curved shape with several leaf-like elements attached to the bottom, with the text 'White' below it.

diagram_descriptions: A template for a layered papercut project. It shows five different designs, each within a square frame. The first design is a simple oval. The second, fourth, and fifth designs show a curved outline with multiple leaf shapes attached to the bottom. The third design shows a cluster of leaf shapes in the upper right corner.
The text 'TEMPLATES' is displayed in the top left corner, next to a stylized icon.
The title 'Layered papercut (pages 42-45)' is displayed prominently.
The instruction 'Enlarge to 330%' is shown below the title.
Below the first template, the text 'Grey border (optional)' is visible.
Below the second template, the text 'Lilac' is visible.
Below the third template, the text 'Yellow' is visible.
Below the fourth template, the text 'Pink' is visible.
Below the fifth template, the text 'White' is visible.
The page number '148' is displayed at the bottom left.

templates.name: Papercut variation
templates.shape_description: A circular outline with a decorative element in one quadrant. The variations show different decorative elements and colors.

diagram_descriptions: Top-left diagram: A circle with a decorative element resembling a flower or fan in the top-right quadrant.
Top-right diagram: A plain circle within a square.
Middle-left diagram: A circle with the text 'Pastel pink' below it. A decorative element resembling leaves or petals is in the bottom-left quadrant.
Middle-right diagram: A circle with a decorative element resembling a flower with many petals in the top-right quadrant, with the text 'Teal' below it.
Bottom-left diagram: A circle with the text 'Orange' below it. A decorative element resembling leaves is in the bottom-left quadrant.
Bottom-right diagram: A circle with a decorative element resembling a flower with many petals in the bottom-right quadrant, with the text 'White' below it.

templates.name: Oval papercut variation
templates.shape_description: Five oval outlines are shown. The first oval is a plain outline labeled 'Grey border'. The second oval has a floral cutout on the right side, labeled 'Teal'. The third oval has a scalloped pattern on the top right, labeled 'Pastel pink'. The fourth oval has a leaf-like cutout on the bottom left, labeled 'Orange'. The fifth oval has a floral cutout on the right side, labeled 'White'.

projects.name: Nursery papercut
projects.finished_product_description: A papercut scene with two bunnies, clouds, a moon, stars, and flowers. The scene is set against a background of clouds and foliage. The bunnies appear to be interacting with each other, with one holding a flower. The overall theme is whimsical and suitable for a nursery.

projects.name: Papercut locket
projects.finished_product_description: A papercut design of a butterfly, intended to be scaled to fit the size of a locket.

diagram_descriptions: A papercut design featuring two bunnies facing each other amidst grass, with clouds, a crescent moon, and hanging stars above. Small flowers are scattered at the bottom.
A papercut design of a butterfly with intricate patterns on its wings.

templates.name: Papercut lantern template
templates.shape_description: A long, rectangular strip designed to be folded into a lantern. It features intricate cutouts of branches, leaves, flowers, and birds. The strip has tabs on the sides for assembly and is divided into four vertical sections, each with a repeating pattern of the nature scene. The edges have decorative cutouts.

projects.name: Koi carp lantern
projects.finished_product_description: A lantern shaped like a koi carp.

projects.name: Lily lantern
projects.finished_product_description: A lantern shaped like a lily flower.

templates.name: Koi carp lantern
templates.shape_description: A pattern for a koi carp lantern, featuring a stylized koi fish with scales and fins, surrounded by swirling water or air elements. The outline includes decorative scalloped edges on the right side.

templates.name: Lily lantern
templates.shape_description: A pattern for a lily lantern, featuring a stylized lily flower with detailed petals and stamen, connected by swirling stems and leaves. The outline includes decorative scalloped edges on the left side.

diagram_descriptions: A line drawing of a koi carp lantern template, showing a fish swimming amidst swirling shapes and decorative edges.
A line drawing of a lily lantern template, showing a lily flower with stems and leaves, and decorative edges.

projects.name: Owl mobile

details.description: 12 U-shaped segments arranged in 3 rows of 4, with dotted lines indicating scoring

details.position: across the top of the head

blueprint_data.assembly_notes: Score along dotted lines on the Breast pieces. The Body piece has a dashed line across the top of the head.

projects.finished_product_description: An owl mobile made from paper cutouts.

diagram_descriptions: A collection of paper templates for an owl mobile. Includes leaf shapes for leaves and wings, a circular piece with a pattern of U-shaped segments for the breast, circular shapes for eyes, an owl body shape with a dashed line, and several star shapes of varying sizes.

projects.name: Party crown

details.description: Long horizontal strip with a jagged, spiky top edge.
Long horizontal strip with a jagged, spiky top edge.

blueprint_data.assembly_notes: Scale band to fit. Join the front and back crown pieces using the tabs to form a complete crown.

tips: Scale band to fit.

templates.name: Party crown (Back crown)
templates.shape_description: A long horizontal band with a jagged, spiky top edge. It features one large diamond-shaped cut-out at the top center and two smaller diamond/oval-shaped cut-outs near the bottom center. There are small rectangular tabs with dashed lines on both the left and right ends for joining.

templates.name: Party crown (Front crown)
templates.shape_description: A long horizontal band with a jagged, spiky top edge. It features one large diamond-shaped cut-out at the top center and two smaller diamond/oval-shaped cut-outs near the bottom center. There are small rectangular tabs with dashed lines on both the left and right ends for joining.

diagram_descriptions: Line drawing of the 'Back crown' template, showing a long horizontal band with a spiky top edge, a large diamond cut-out at the top center, two smaller diamond/oval cut-outs at the bottom center, and joining tabs on the ends.

Line drawing of the 'Front crown' template, identical in design to the 'Back crown', showing a long horizontal band with a spiky top edge, a large diamond cut-out at the top center, two smaller diamond/oval cut-outs at the bottom center, and joining tabs on the ends.

templates.name: Butterfly crown
templates.shape_description: A large outline of a butterfly crown with flowers and butterflies. Below the crown are several smaller outlines of butterflies and flowers. The crown itself is a long, wavy strip with cutouts. There is a horizontal line with small vertical dashes at the bottom of the crown outline, indicating where to cut or join. Below this line are two butterfly outlines, one larger above a smaller one. To the right of the butterflies are several flower outlines of varying sizes and petal counts. One flower has 3 petals, two have 5 petals, and two have 8 petals. The instruction 'Scale band to fit' is present.

templates.name: Daffodil

A trumpet shape that is rectangular with a jagged top edge and a dashed vertical line on the left side, with a vertical line in the center. A long, oval-shaped daffodil leaves template with a horizontal line in the center.

diagram_descriptions: A large heart shape and a large leaf shape with a serrated edge, labeled 'Large rose (pages 104-107)' and 'Enlarge to 175%'. The leaf is labeled 'Large leaf x 1'. The heart shape is labeled 'Medium petals x 10'.

A diagram for a daffodil, labeled 'Daffodil (pages 100-103)' and 'Actual size'. It includes a petal template, a trumpet template with instructions to 'Place dotted line on fold of paper', and a daffodil leaves template.
